description: Deletes the event stream for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

nested_items.name: EventStream
nested_items.description: Specifies settings for publishing event data to an Amazon Kinesis data stream or an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application to publish event data for.

nested_items.name: DestinationStreamArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Kinesis data stream or Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery stream to publish event data to.

nested_items.name: ExternalId
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) Your AWS account ID, which you assigned to an external ID key in an IAM trust policy. Amazon Pinpoint previously used this value to assume an IAM role when publishing event data, but we removed this requirement. We don't recommend use of external IDs for IAM roles that are assumed by Amazon Pinpoint.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date, in ISO 8601 format, when the event stream was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM user who last modified the event stream.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that authorizes Amazon Pinpoint to publish event data to the stream in your AWS account.
